sentences.english: The planet Jupiter blazes near the waxing gibbous moon tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚光辉四溢的木星和月亮拉近了距离。

sentences.english: Whither go these majestic irradiations of the soul?Into the shadow;
sentences.chinese: 灵魂的那种庄严光辉放射到什么地方去呢？

sentences.english: Sunlight floating down the paddy fields, the brilliant orange flowing in the above.
sentences.chinese: 阳光洒落在稻田上，桔色的光辉在上面流动着。
她眼睛里闪烁著调皮的光辉。

sentences.english: Direct access to the full glory of a new era.
sentences.chinese: 直达光辉灿烂的新纪元。

sentences.english: I've seen the dark, I've seen the brightness in one little spark.
sentences.chinese: 我见过黑暗，我见过小火花的光辉。

sentences.english: Let the sky lanterns shine, to illuminate the future, shine with great splendor, blessing the world.
sentences.chinese: 让天灯普照大地，照亮未来，光辉灿烂，降福人间。

sentences.english: Lei Feng is a brilliant example for us to learn from. ( to learn from the example)
sentences.chinese: 雷锋是我们学习的光辉榜样。

sentences.english: Jute uprise is banner of brightness of one side of viatic of success of exploration China revolution.
sentences.chinese: 黄麻起义是探索中国革命成功道路的一面光辉旗帜。

sentences.english: The brilliant shine dazzling me, I will be the dawn of the star.
sentences.chinese: 耀眼的光辉照耀着我，我将会成为拂晓之星。

sentences.english: The scandal he was involved in before detracts his from great glorious.
sentences.chinese: 他以往卷入的那件丑问已使他的光辉业绩大为失色。

sentences.english: Proudly he beat his rays upon the earth, warming the vast landthat lay below.
sentences.chinese: 他自豪地把光辉洒向地球，温暖着脚下广袤的土地。

sentences.english: Premier Zhou's illustrious deeds are an everlasting monument in the hearts of the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 周总理的光辉业绩在中国人民心中立下了不朽的丰碑。

sentences.english: Therefore your light glistens in my tears.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你的光辉闪烁在我的泪花之中。

sentences.english: Yes,“fairness and justice must be more brilliant than the sun” [This is somethingChinese Premier Wen Jiabao said earlier this year].
sentences.chinese: 是的，让公平正义比太阳还要有光辉。

sentences.english: The setting sun casts a warm glow over stream-filled valleys.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳西下，在溪流潺潺的山谷上投下一缕温暖的光辉。
